title: From One Graphical Representation to Another
question_text:
At The Marvelous Marshmallow Market, customers were invited to suggest a new flavor for marshmallows. The finalists were announced and a vote was held. Results of the vote are displayed in the graph below.
Created for Albert.io. Copyright 2016. All rights reserved.

If $200$ votes were cast, which of the following graphs displays the frequency distribution for the votes?
